title: Topic 001 Question 014
body: You are implementing Microsoft Office 365 Message Encryption (OME) for a Microsoft 365 tenant named contoso.com.
You need to meet the following requirements:
✑ All email to a domain named fabrikam.com must be encrypted automatically.
✑ Encrypted emails must expire seven days after they are sent.
What should you configure for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
